name: Freemium
description: Injects custom styling on the web UI to remove native enterprise branding and add other QOL improvements.

settings_schema.header: Configure which UI modifications are applied. Changes take effect on the next page load.

settings.help_text: Hide just the "TEAM EDITION" / "FREE EDITION" badge text in the global header, while keeping the Mattermost logo and name visible.
Hide the entire Mattermost branding in the global header (logo, name, and badge). Overrides the badge-only setting when enabled.
Hide Mattermost branding with the free badge on the login page.
Hide trial and upgrade prompts including the start trial button, upgrade dialogs, view plans button, and admin console banner.
Hide references to paid features such as User Groups in the product switcher and premium keyword settings.
Enable layout fixes for the Boards plugin and the mobile navigation button.
